en.meta_description: Play Secret Santa with your friend! No login or mail required.
en.page_subtitle: free and open source. No login required
en.explain_text: Insert your friends' names and press "generate links". Each person gets their own unique link. Send it and they'll discover their Secret Santa assignment.
en.about_text_0: Everything runs in your browser. No data is sent to any server, ever.
en.about_text_1: Share links however you want: WhatsApp, Telegram, email, or even in             person.
en.about_text_2: Once you close the page, even you can't see who got whom.
en.footer_credit: Simple Secret Santa - Developed by Domenico Scaletta
en.footer_text:
this page is enterly client-side: a static HTML with zero backend hosted by GithubPages. All the christmas magic happens in your browser :)
No data collected, no cookies, no trackers. View the source on Github
